post_message: RAW VIDEO: A shopper claims she caught security guards at a Chandler Walmart putting a suspected shoplifter in a chokehold.  She took the video below on her cell phone. You can hear the woman shouting "I can't breathe. I can't breathe." She then appears to be passed out on the ground.   Do you think security was too rough, or just doing their job?
